text:
```(jl_dDFSry) pkg> precompile

julia> @time (using Plots; display(plot(1:0.1:10, sin.(1:0.1:10))))
[ Info: Precompiling Plots [91a5bcdd-55d7-5caf-9e0b-520d859cae80]```
:disappointed:

text: Do you think you could figure out a repro? Frustratingly I closed my session and I can’t remember what lead to it

elements.text: Do you think you could figure out a repro? Frustratingly I closed my session and I can’t remember what lead to it

text:
There is this edge case I knew about:
```pkg> add Plots, GR
...
julia> using Plots

pkg> pin GR@0.52.0 # roll back GR
... # precomp will ? for Plots given it's loaded


#restart julia


pkg> precompile

julia> using Plots
[ Info: Precompiling Plots [91a5bcdd-55d7-5caf-9e0b-520d859cae80]```
